function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High air change rate and complete air mixing may lead to rapid spread of contagious diseases if present in the chamber","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and contamination of the chamber environment","Mitigation":"Implement air filtration systems and regular disinfection protocols to reduce the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C germicidal lights, disinfection sprays","People":"Individuals conducting experiments, research staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management, research institution"},{"Description":"Injection of VOCs (volatile organic compounds) like formaldehyde and toluene into the chamber for testing","Impact":"Exposure to high levels of VOCs if not properly managed or contained","Mitigation":"Use of proper ventilation and exhaust systems to control VOC levels, and personal protective equipment for individuals working in the chamber","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, exhaust hoods, personal protective equipment","People":"Individuals conducting experiments, research staff","Owner":"Facility management, research institution"},{"Description":"Variation in filter bed moisture content levels during tests may impact the efficiency of VOCs removal and air quality","Impact":"Inconsistent performance of the DBAF in removing VOCs and maintaining air quality","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of filter bed moisture content levels, and optimization of airflow rates through the DBAF","Technologies":"Moisture sensors, automated airflow controls, regular maintenance protocols","People":"Individuals conducting experiments, research staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management, research institution"}]}
